about_the_game:
Hieroglyph Quest: The Amarna Enigma is an education game, created to be an introductory to the ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphics! Meanwhile the story is (loosely) based on actual historical events of roughly 3500 years ago!

This game is based on other similar games as well as the classical japanese rpgs. Our goal is to provide a fun learning experience that is more than just learning lists of words and characters, but provides an actual game experience.
